Summary: Hovering white light for 8-10 minutes, moved slowly away, quickly returned and disappeared, then reappeared further away in a matter of seconds.
divs: sighting detailsi was looking at an airplane travelling overhead with my daughter from our backyard this afternoon. she pointed out another "plane" but i noticed it wasn't moving much, like it was holding its position in the sky pretty well. i could not tell the altitude, but it was pretty high up and no sound was audible. it was a windy day, so i ruled out a balloon or a bird. then, after getting my wife to verify what i saw, i snapped several photos of the object. it slowly started to drift to the south\south west for a couple of miles (took about 30 seconds) then held that position again for a couple of minutes. then, it rapidly flew back towards the original position in an arced flight pattern and held for a few seconds before vanishing. my wife and i saw the disappearance. then in a matter of seconds it reappeard close to the second position it was hovering for a short time before vanishing after less than a minute.
